body.name: Chicco Bravo 3-in-1 Trio Travel System, Quick-Fold Stroller with KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat and base | Camden/Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 24 mins
features: CAR SEAT AND STROLLER COMBO – The Chicco Bravo Quick-Fold Stroller paired with the Chicco KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat creates a baby travel system.
SEAMLESS TRANSITIONS – A removable seat and canopy transform the stroller to a lightweight infant car seat carrier and offers secure, click-in attachment via the child tray – no adapter needed.

EASY TO USE | EASY TO STORE – With a compact, one-hand, smart fold design, the stroller stands independently without the push handle touching the ground. Large wheels with treaded tires and all-wheel suspension help navigate uneven terrain.

INFANT CAR SEAT – Easy to install, the KeyFit 30 features premium LATCH connectors, a SuperCinch Force Multiplying Tightener, EPS energy-absorbing foam and removable head and body support, ideal for a newborn car seat.

COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE – The Bravo Stroller features a one-hand, multi-position reclining seat, child tray with cup holders and large storage basket. A UPF 50+ canopy with peek-a-boo mesh window provides privacy and protection from the elements.
body.description: A Perfect Match: The Power Couple of Infant TravelThe Chicco Bravo Trio Travel System combines the full-size Bravo Quick-Fold Stroller with the KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat and base for streamlined travel. With easy click-in compatibility, the KeyFit 30 is secured via the Bravo child tray, offering adapter-free convenience and effortless transitions from car to stroller.Three modes – a lightweight frame carrier, a versatile travel system and a full-size toddler stroller – cater to your travel needs as your little one grows from newborn to toddler.Comfort and ConvenienceFor child comfort, the Chicco Bravo features a one-hand, multi-position reclining seat, a convenient child tray with cup holders, storage basket and a large, UPF 50+ canopy with peek-a-boo mesh window for protection from the elements in all 3 modes.The Bravo Stroller showcases large, sleek wheels with treaded tires and all-wheel suspension to navigate uneven terrain. The rear-linked foot brake secures the stroller with a simple tap and the multi-position push handle adjusts in height for parent comfort.For additional parent convenience, the toddler stroller has a one-hand smart fold with auto-swivel front wheels and stands independently on the wheels without the parent handle touching the ground. The large storage basket features two organizer pockets, mesh sides for visibility and easy front & rear access.Infant Travel SystemThe baby stroller and car seat combo 3 in 1 includes the KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat engineered with innovative safety features, like RideRightTM Bubble Level-Indicators, ReclineSureTM Spring-Loaded Leveling Foot, premium LATCH connectors for easy attachment and removal and the one-pull SuperCinch Force-Multiplying LATCH Tightener that make it the easiest infant car seat to install correctly.For installation with the vehicle seat belt, clear belt routing and integrated lock-offs make it easy to position, tighten and lock the belt into place.

One-Hand Smart Fold Fold handle located under the seat pad is easy to reach for an effortless, compact fold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loooove this stroller
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this stroller/car seat combo. Everyone who sees it says it’s very nice. It rolls very easy, folds very quick and isn’t too heavy. The car seat is very sturdy and I feel my daughter is extremely safe in it. It also assembles easily and for the price, it’s the best bang for your buck. We looked into many car seats and decided on this one and were extremely glad we did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy I chose this one!
reviews.reviewText: There are soooo many travel systems out there, I truly agonized over which one to purchase. This was one of the more affordable ones I found, and I was between it and a similar graco model. So far I have been nothing but impressed with this stroller/car seat combo.Assembly was easy, quick one hand fold action, with easy but secure transfer ability from stroller to car. The stroller is quite tall, I am 5’9 and my husband is 6’3 and neither of us have to slouch over it. It folds up small enough to fit in the trunk of our tiny sedan, and both the stroller and car seat are fairly light! The last thing I will add (as this was something I stressed a lot about) is that the car seat is great for a newborn! It has built in cushion that keeps my baby propped up and secure, which I was a lot of complaints about for other travel systems I considered. I can’t speak for the toddler seat yet, but it looks very nice and I look forward to trying that out eventually.Edit:My baby is 8 months old now, so few thoughts to add to this review.We now use the stroller without the car seat and the toddler seat is great. It reclines far enough back that I can actually change our baby in it if we’re out and about.My only real complaint about this travel system is for the actual carseat… the handle on it has buttons you have to push in on both sides to move the handle. For a stroller that is made for the purpose of one hand actions, this design really didn’t make sense. It is very unfortunate if you’re driving alone and need it moved when you’re in the front. Definitely not a deal breaker for me though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very strong and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This travel set is really strong, easy to set up and comfortable. I am so happy to have it for a while. It is safe and easy to carry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to assemble and disassemble/ breakdown. Rides super smooth. The car seat is so easy to install into vehicles and the strap adjustment is super easy as well! Great product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The car seat feels really solid but not overly bulky with excessive weight so will be easier to carry than others that Ive used. The base that it snaps into is nice makes it a lot easier to put in and out of the car. I like the stroller it does feel really solid and seems like it will not have issues getting stuck in grass etc. the only part that I worry about that feels a bit weak is the handle. There are times you need to wheely the stroller to get up curbs higher ledges and it does flex a bit I do worry that I will break it in half I'm not careful. But the rest of the construction is nice. A lot of padding and looks like everything will provide as much protection as I could expect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints here!
reviews.reviewText: This was super easy to assemble out of the box, it’s beautiful and everything about it looks and feels like great quality. Both the car seat and the stroller are maybe a little heavier than I expected but not too heavy to bother me. We’re having a winter baby so the extra money to get this set with the keyfit 35 zip is so worth it! Would also be perfect for a spring newborn or somewhere it rains a lot.The adult cup holders and storage space on the handle bar was a must have for us, and it’s something some of the other Chicco travel sets don’t offer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my first baby This car is really useful. We never had a hard time installing the car. The wheels are really beautiful. A light car . I recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what we wanted
reviews.reviewText: Picked this travel system based off reviews and we're very happy with it. We watched a video on YouTube to help us assemble it, and it was really easy to put together. Installing the bases in the car was a little difficult with one because the clips are thicker and it was harder to fit in one of the cars hooks. But overall the bases sit perfectly as well. We've now been using this with the newborn for a few weeks and we love it. Love how it folds easily to open and close. Love the extra large cargo space in the bottom, which fits my big diaper backpack. The stroller runs smoothly and the carseat clicks in and out easily.Definitely recommend this for anyone debating on getting it. It's perfect for our newborn and exactly what we wanted.
Buenos materiales, práctica, resistente, no es tan pesada

Esta carreola resulto excelente!! Estamos encantados.Súper amortiguadores, sirve para andar en pasto y lugares donde las banquetas no están parejas, no se atora en el pasto.Fácil de doblar para colocar en el auto, y el car seat es muy fácil de poner sobre la base del auto.Fue la mejor compra que pudimos hacer.

No tengo queja alguna sobre la carriola están nueva, y se siente de muy buen material sin embargo se nota que la abrieron y maltrataron la caja afortunadamente no la abrieron de más, estoy enamorado de la carriola , en 6 meses doy mi actualización 🤣
Estamos sumamente satisfechos con ella. Es muy segura, práctica, ligera, funcional, cómoda para el bebé y para nosotros y a demás, es muy bonita. Excelente compra. Muy recomendada
Es tan cómoda que a veces la dormimos en ella dentro de la casa
